resources.string: Liary - the app that keeps track of the lies you said so that you won\'t mix the info further said

How to use : 

 	- Create a password to secure your liary so no one knows the lies you said. 
 	- Lies are stored on a local database that can be deleted any time. 
 	- To record a lie you must also select the person you lied to and the gravity of the lie, from green to red, where green means the lie was an easy one and red means that the lie was really bad and it should not be discovered under any circumstances.

My liary - collection of lies stored on a local database 

 Tell me a lie - record the lie you said, the person you lied to and the gravity of the lie 

 Black lie list - keeps track of the number of times you lied to one person 

 Erase all diary - permanently deletes all the lies you told
